inbodydescription.para: < Ensure that each item of a column has the same size

briefdescription.para: Function used for computing communication statistics in the global.TU.

parameterdescription.para: The three parameters are updated by their mean value over the processors

simplesect.para: an array of array that contains the min, max, average and standard deviation over the processors of the three parameters of the function
